mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.doc_code AS "docCode", a.storage_code AS "storageCode", a.storage_date AS "storageDate", a.storage_department AS "storageDepartment", a.storage_repertory AS "storageRepertory", a.storage_flag AS "storageFlag", a.storage_audit_flag AS "storageAuditFlag", a.storage_type AS "storageType", a.storage_create AS "storageCreate", a.storage_auditor AS "storageAuditor", a.storage_handler AS "storageHandler", a.storage_create_date AS "storageCreateDate", a.storage_audit_date AS "storageAuditDate", a.remark AS "remark", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO doc_init_storage_main( id, doc_code, storage_code, storage_date, storage_department, storage_repertory, storage_flag, storage_audit_flag, storage_type, storage_create, storage_auditor, storage_handler, storage_create_date, storage_audit_date, remark, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3 ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{docCode}, #{storageCode}, #{storageDate}, #{storageDepartment}, #{storageRepertory}, #{storageFlag}, #{storageAuditFlag}, #{storageType}, #{storageCreate}, #{storageAuditor}, #{storageHandler}, #{storageCreateDate}, #{storageAuditDate}, #{remark}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3} )
mapper.update: UPDATE doc_init_storage_main SET doc_code = #{docCode}, storage_code = #{storageCode}, storage_date = #{storageDate}, storage_department = #{storageDepartment}, storage_repertory = #{storageRepertory}, storage_flag = #{storageFlag}, storage_audit_flag = #{storageAuditFlag}, storage_type = #{storageType}, storage_create = #{storageCreate}, storage_auditor = #{storageAuditor}, storage_handler = #{storageHandler}, storage_create_date = #{storageCreateDate}, storage_audit_date = #{storageAuditDate}, remark = #{remark}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3} WHERE id = #{id}
